direction.left\_after\_right: composition f ∘ g means: apply g first, then f.
direction.right\_after\_left: composition g ∘ f means: apply f first, then g.

result\_notation.Xi\_lift: XiVar(F) denotes Xi-based lifting/synthesis of family F.
result\_notation.Xi\_pushforward: F⟨XiVar⟩ denotes F composed after XiVar, pushing synthesis through F.
result\_notation.Xi\_normal\_form: NF\_Xi(expr) denotes the unique Xi-normal form of expr.
